sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { UserService } from '../services/user.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { emailValidatorPattern = "^[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,4}$"; constructor(private userService: UserService, private router: Router) { } submitHandler(form: NgForm): void { if (form.invalid) { return; } const { username, email, passwords, age, } = form.value; this.userService .register(username, email, passwords.password, passwords.rePassword, age,) .subscribe(() => { this.router.navigate(['/login']); }); } }

Register

Username is required!
Username must be more then 5 characters!
Email is required!
Invalid email!
Age is required!
Age must be between 1 and 105!
Password is required!
Password must be more then 5 characters!
Repeat password is required!
Passwords don't match!
